title: Post-Clear Fun!
detail_text: <:th_ch0106/>Rina! Rina~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Ah, Yoshiko-chan.... What is it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>It’s not Yoshiko, it’s Yohane. So umm, remember that one game? I cleared it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>You did? Then....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Kukuku. That’s right, nothing is a spoiler anymore.... You said you wanted to talk to me about it, so Yohane came here to do just that.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Thank you.... for going out of your way. I’m happy. Then, why don’t you come to my place today? I have so much.... to talk about. Like what happened to the best friend character at the end of chapter 4....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Ah, no, I’m gonna cry again if we talk about that part!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Then.... How the enemy in chapter 6....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Aaaaaah, not that part! I never expected a character from chapter 2 would become like that! It surprised me so much and left me in tears.... *Sniff*<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Here.... tissues. Let’s go right away. There’s so much I want to talk about.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
